VIII.i.3.A.2.b
.
Prohibition on Multiple Chapter 18 Allowances
An individual is eligible to receive only one Chapter 18 monthly allowance.
Note
:Â  An individual currently receiving spina bifida benefits under
38 CFR 3.814
who has another qualifying birth defect under
38 CFR 3.815
will be paid the greater Chapter 18 monthly benefit.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - General Chapter 18 Benefits Information
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
